She was wearing a pair of thin glasses and had a pierced lip. She was wearing a blue one piece swimsuit.

The axolotl women looked around and you could only look in awe at her huge figure. She was large all around from top to bottom and from the looks of it she was very annoyed. "Where are you?" she asks. "I know you're in here? There's somebody else in my cave." You try to run but then you trip and have to grab this giant woman by the tip of her large fat tail to keep your balance.

Unfortunately this alerts the axolotl woman. "Someone has their hands on my tail," she said. "There's only one thing that could be that small. A human." The axolotl woman pulls up her tail and you stare her right in the moon sized eye.
12512.title: Female

125122.content:
The axolotl woman gives a fiendish smile and you start to shiver. You didn't even know axolotls had teeth. "I haven't seen a human in years," she says as she licks your face with her large tongue and makes you twitch. "You picked the wrong cave to visit little man." The salamander girl laughs and shakes her huge fat body and you see her belly moving from side to side even when she stopped movie. "Listen lady," you say. "I don't want any trouble."

The axolotl girl then takes out a pack of cigarettes, lights one and then blows the smog in your face to make you cough and keel over. "That's just too bad," says the axolotl woman as she adjusts her glasses. "We anthros rule the world and you humans are little more than talking insects." She then presses her cigarette on your chest and burns you as she gives an evil wheezing laugh. "Fortunately there are many uses for you. Fortunately that is for me, and not you." The axolotl presses you against her fat stomach and forces you to suck on her sweat from her bikini and you gag and hold onto your neck.

Then she proceeds to press you against one of her thighs and manages to break two of your ribs as you grunt and groan. "The only question," she says as she licks her cheek. "Is what can a do with such a tiny man. I could use a new human slave. My last one got squashed between the rolls on my stomach." You shake as she smiles evilly and then takes you up to her face. "Or," she says. "I could just gobble you up. Whole and alive." She licks her lips. Either way you were screwed.

What does the axolotl girl decide to do with you?
125122.title: Evil Axolotl

12521.content:
You looked up at the massive toad however it looked human like as he was standing up tall and wearing brown pants, goggles , and big boots.

You were so caught up in looking at the frog's clothing that you failed to notice it looking down at you and begin to reaching for you. Finally snapping out of it you look up again to see a big webbed hand coming towards you. You don't have time to run as the toad wraps his hand around you.

You feel the mucous like skin around your body as the toad brings you to his face as he opens hand you sit in his palm to see the toad has a look of...
12521.title: City Toad man

125212.content:
The toad and you locked eyes for what seemed like forever, you staring into his big blue eyes as they looked you over, looking at the giant's face you couldn't help but think he looked a little. ...cute for a toad somehow

Finally you decided to break the silence.
Ummm hello, you spoke

The toad jerked his head back in surprise after hearing you speak.
You talked!, he said surprised

He spoke again,
You look like one, can talk like one, and "sniff""sniff" you smell like one.
Are you a ...human?

Uh Ye...yes I am.
The toad's face suddenly lit up like a Christmas tree, I knew it! I knew it! Grampa was right they're still around

The toad stopped his happy face when he realized you were still sitting in his palm.
Oh! Sorry I got a little excited, he said rubbing the back of his head
No it's fine.

My name is toby Ummm hello human ,he said
My name is jake.
Toby brought a hand forward but quickly pointed his finger instead to you, taking the gesture you shook his finger like a hand.

I just can't believe it a real life human on front of me.
Wait so humans don't exist here.

No but from what my grandpa told me there was many before.

So do you think your grandfather could tell me how I got here?,you ask hopefully

Yeah gramps knows a lot he can help you

Could you take me to him
Yeah let's go..

Toby then..
125212.title: A curious look.

choices: You wake up the next morning.
1252121.content:
Toby held you cupped in both his hands as he walked down the path to his house, after sitting on his palms for awhile Toby's skun began to feel less weird and more smooth. Luckily his house was in the forest so there was a low chance he come across another anthro.

Eventually he had arrived at a two story house which showed some signs of decay but it wasn't too bad. After opening the door toby placed his hands on a desk near the door, taking this as a hint you walked off his hands to the desk. As soon as you were off toby bent down and began to undo the laces to his boots before slipping them off, revealing his two toed webbed feet and putting the shoes by the door.

"Sorry I kinda cleaned up the house and didn't want to dirty it". He said as he stood up

You couldn't help but smile at his modesty.
"It's alright"

Your stepped onto his waiting palm as he walked into the house to a door on the wall. Behind the door you could hear faint noises .
With his other hand he knocked on the door before speaking.
"Granddad I'm home can I talk to you for a moment".
The noise soon went silent as he weird a voice reply.
"Sure come on down".

Opening the door you saw stairs that led to a basement. You were a little nervous and toby seem to notice as you looked at him he gave a resuring smile before walking down into the basement. When he reached the bottom you looked around and saw a study which had book on the table and floor and soon saw another toad sitting at a computer. The toad was a darker shade of green then toby and had a botten up shirt with the sleeves rolled up and brown pants you also notice he had some gray hair and wasn't wearing shoes either.
Toby must of made his take them off.

As he walked towards the older toad his fingers curled around you as he brought his hand behind him, you guess he didn't want to surprise him.
Toby stood still as Grandpa turned around getting ready to show his grandfather what he had told him his whole life had exist. He remembered he was always gentle to the specimens he showed to toby and was sure he would with a human as well.
"So what did you want to talk about"? Grandpa said.

"We'll remember all the stories you've told me about the humans"

"Yeah why"
Toby brought his hand from behind his back before opening his hand up revealing jake who looked up

Grandpa looked surprised , taking of his glasses and rubbing his eyes before putting them back on and looking at you.
"I found him today and he told me that he is a human"
"Ummm hello I'm jake"

Grandpa was silent before he grinned and started to laugh.
"I I i.. can't believe a real life human in front of me".
He dropped to his knees so his face was in front of you.
"Hello my name is stan".
"Nice to meet you", you replied.
Stan brought his hands up together and touched his fingers to Toby's. Hesitantly you steeped onto his wrinkly webbed hands all the while stan kept looking in wonder at the creature he heard so much about standing on his hands.
Soon he brought his hands over to toby and you walked back on to his palm before toby spoke.

"He's lost and I was hoping you could in anyway help"

"I have knowledge on the human species but tell me jake what events occurred before you met toby."
You then told all you knew with finding the stone and then suddenly waking up before toby and also said you lost the stone. Taking this in stan soon stood up and walked up to a bookcase before scanning through and pulling out a book and opening and reading it.
"It's was believed that a stone created millenniums ago could serve as a gateway to another world".
"I remember when I was Toby's age I saw a human as well however he disappeared before I could talk to him".

"So this is how he knows about humans". You thought

"Don't worry intill the stone can be found yu can stay here."
"Thank you"

Toby soon walked up to his room thinking about everything that happened today but tomorrow could hold so much more but now it was time for bed
Using a handkerchief as a makeshift bed for jake he moved his hand to put jake down but first he spoke.
"Hey thanks you for uhh helping me today".

Toby smiled and soon brought his hand up to his chest and gently hugged jake.

Now it was time for bed and as you fell asleep....
1252121.title: Took you to grandpa

12522.content:
As you're trying to figure out your surroundings, you hear vibrations and then you fall down because something is coming forward almost as if it's jumping. "What the?" You ask. It is then you hear buzzing and you look up to see a giant purple fly that buzzes and then flies down, obviously to make a meal out of you.

You scream and run as the big fly comes down and tries to grab you. When it looks like you're about to be fly food, something big and slimy comes down and wraps around the fly. The pink object then retracts and you look to see the pink object and the fly disappear into what looks like a black hole. You look up and gasp because you see a giant yellow skinned toad woman, chubby in body shape and with orange-blonde hair. She was wearing nothing but a gray loincloth and bra.

The toad girl chews on the giant purple fly before swallowing and lets out a slight belch before rubbing her stomach. You decide that while the toad woman is distracted, you better run off before the toad woman decides to have you for desert. But before you could get anywhere, the toad woman hops forward and creates a mini earthquake. You roll and get in between the toad woman's toes. You struggle but you're wedged in too tight.

You really hope the giant toad doesn't find you.
12522.title: Savage She-Toad

choices: You're Not Swallowed for Some Reason
125221.content:
You struggle between the webbed toes and that's when the giant toad woman begins to feel you and lets out a curious croak. The toad woman lifts her foot and you stare up at her as her moon sized eye is above you. The toad giantess lets out a croak and then licks her lips with her long tongue and you gasp because you realize just what the toad has planned for you.

You scream and struggle to get out as the toad woman lashes out her tongue. Thankfully you manage to slip out of her toes just as the toad woman's tongue is about to get you. The toad giantess inflates her throat and then flashes her tongue in the air before leaping after you.

You try to run but then the toad giantess lands in front of you and you bump into her massive wart covered behind. The toad turns around and smiles wickedly at you before she flashes her tongue again. She almost snatches you when you lift up your leg and scream. The toad giantess lets out a laugh and then slams her hands on the ground trying to grab you. The toad is toying with you.

You scream again before the toad inflates her throat again and then lashes out her tongue. This time she catches you and pulls you into the air as you continue to scream. You shake out of your shirt as the toad woman pulls her tongue back in. You fall and bounce on the toad giantess's chubby belly into her cleavage where you helplessly bounce from side to side as the toad gives an evil and seductive smile and shakes her hips to bounce you around.

This toad enjoys her sadistic fun before she swings her tongue again and snatches you up. You yell as the toad tosses you into the air and then reels you in with her tongue. The toad woman shakes her head from side to side and pokes herself in the cheeks as she smiles from... well, toads don't have ears.

All while you're being tossed around in her mouth.
125221.title: A Toad's Toes

choices: You Slip and Fall Through a Tunnel
125222.content:
By some miracle the toad woman doesn't feel you between your toes because she doesn't even bother to look down. Instead she shoots out her tongue to catch and eat more purple flies. You let out a sigh of relief. If that toad woman saw you that it was all too possible for you to end up like those flies. You're about to get out from the toes to make a beeline for it, but it would appear that fate has different plans for you that day.

You look up to see the she-toad's legs bending and you realize she's going to jump. So you have no choice but to cling to her toes as she leaps into the air. The jump of the frog woman takes you hundreds if not thousands of feet into the air and as you look down, you see that this cave was made up of several tunnels and stalagmites. This led you to believe that this toad woman was only one of many strange inhabitants of the tunnels. You hold on tight and shudder. You had no idea what else could be in your new surroundings. You imagined dragons, bears and even giant weasels coming out of the tunnels. Even this toad you clung to was dangerous because she was hopping so fast that the wind turbulence was hitting you hard.

Your hands slip until you cling to the tip of the toad's toe. You very nearly get crushed as the toad woman hops across a few more rocks. Can you keep up with this hopping giantess?
125222.title: She's Oblivious

1252222.content:
As you try holding onto the toad woman's toes, you keep on slipping before the she-toad bounces off the ceiling. That last bounce knocks you off the toad woman's toe and you fall screaming down one of the tunnels. You bounce across the walls as the tunnels goes down and down. By the time you stop falling, you land on the hard ground.

You groan as you get up and feel your back. It's unbelievably sore from falling on those jagged rocks. Your shirt is even torn slightly and by some miracle there isn't even a single drop of blood on you. You grumble and start to walk forward and see another tunnel. This cave was sure full of surprises. You walk for what must be an hour until you reach the end of the tunnel. You look out and see that you're still in the cave.

You let out a sigh and then take a seat on a rock as you feel your aching back. But you don't have as much time to rest on your laurels as you think because you hear more stomping. As you feared there was something else in this deep dark cave.

You try to get up, but your knees are so sore you can't move your feet. Then you look up to see staring at you was the face of an anthro...
1252222.title: Tunnel Vision

choices: She Takes You Home to Cook You
12522221.content:
You're looking at the face of an enormous black bear. The bear was even bigger than the toad. However, from the looks of it, this bear has long brownish hair, mascara and lipstick. This is a girl bear and she's looking right at you. She actually smiles down on you and shows you her mountainous white teeth. Then what the bear woman does next really scares, she licks every last one of her giant teeth and then licks her lips.

"Well what do you know?" she asks. "I've found a nice and delicious little human." You scream as the bear woman sticks out her tongue and drools. You try to run but the giant hungry black bear snatches you up and holds you in the air by your foot. You're in utter fear as the bear woman drools uncontrollably and even licks you like a lollipop a few times. You even swallow some of her saliva and gag.

"P-Please let me go. I don't want any trouble." The bear woman lets out a laugh as her huge stomach shakes. You notice she's wearing a jacket and pants that look ready to snap off. "Let you go?" asks the giantess. "Sorry, but that isn't an option. There's only one thing we gals do with humans around here and that's..." The bear woman licks her lips and snaps her jaws in front of you before she laughs again.

This was bad. This bear woman wanted to eat you. Then she does the unthinkable and pushes you against her bloated stomach as you muffle. All you can hear is churning of stomach juices. "Hear that little morsel?" asks the bear woman. "That's gonna be your new home."

You're in utter terror now. You were nothing more than food.
12522221.title: Big Bear

12531.content: What Gender is the gecko?
12531.title: Gecko

choices: He shoots at a giant lizard right behind you.
125321.content:
You look up and see a strange sight. It was a giant puma man, the size of a skyscraper. All he was wearing was a loincloth and a satchel full of arrows. You step back as this giant puma looks around with a stern look on his face. You notice that he has a huge scar shaped like a bolt of lightning over his eye. It looks like he's taking caution as if he was looking for somebody. From the looks of it he was looking out for an enemy.

"I know you're here," said the puma man. "I've told your kind that this is our territory. If you think you're taking this cave, you've got another thing coming. The clan war ends today." The puma man takes out an arrow and sharpens it. You're in real trouble. That arrow looks like it's the size of an airplane. You're obviously dealing with a very territorial creature and if you make a wrong move you're as good as shish kabob. You just walk back and then trip.

Unfortunately for you, the puma heard the sound. He then turns his head and glares in your direction. "You were warned," he said. "You had your chance. Now you will die!" The puma holds out his arrow and you let out a scream as he gets ready to fire.
125321.title: The Archer

choices: A teenage shy but friendly wolf girl.
13.content:
You opened your eyes.

Strange tall green plants surrounded you, and you could see some giant foundation through them. Even more interestingly, there was a near deafening noise of people talking and laughing. Many of them sounded like children, but what would a bunch of kids be doing in a weird place like this? You decided to climb one of the plants to get a better view.

As you were climbing the wet green plant, you got the feeling that it reminded you of a blade of grass. With a grunt of effort, you pull yourself onto the top, and gasp at your newly revealed surroundings. You were in front of what looked like a giant school, with building-sized anthros running around. Some of the looked like they might be in kindergarten, while others appeared to be teenagers. "Wow," you said plainly, observing the movements of these colossal beings.

Suddenly, a dark shadow stretched up in front of you, blocking out the sun."What's this thing?" a voice boomed behind you. You quickly turn around to see...
13.title: School of anthros.

choices: show you to his friends for help.
keep you hidden, at least for now.
131.content:
You look up at the towering black dragon anthro, his pale blue eyes observing you. The dragon looks surprised, and reaches down towards you. Too shocked to move, he grabs you between his claws, and holds you in front of his face. "Are you a human? You couldn't be, how did you get here?" "Err... well, I sorta came here by accident. You... you see I found this one rock... and..." The dragon smiled and set you down on his hand. "It's okay. You can just stick with me untill you find a way to get back to wherever you came from. By the way, my name's Zenth, and I go to this school right here." Zenth reaches down to you with one of his claws, and you stand up and shake it. You hear a bell ringing. "Uh-oh, my class is about to start. Here, you can ride in my pocket." Zenth grips you between his forefinger and thumb, and drops you into his pocket. 

You sit in Zenth's pocket, bouncing around in it as he runs towards the school. "Don't worry, I'll figure something out, ok?" you hear Zenth say to you. You climb up and poke your head out of the pocket to see what's happening. Different kinds of anthros run through the school's hallway, some of them stopping to talk with others. Zenth continues walking, and decides to...
131.title: A muscular male dragon teenager.

1312.content:
"I should probably keep you hidden for now." Zenth says. "I know how crazy teenagers can be at times, and some of them might try to eat you or something." Not wanting to end up in some anthro's stomach, you agree and stay in his pocket. Zenth runs off to his class, and you patiently sit inside his pants pocket. 

Soon, you feel Zenth sit down in a chair, probably to take his class. The class starts, and after a few minutes of listening to the teacher blab on and on, you start getting bored. You decide that a little exploring can't hurt, and hoist yourself out of Zenth's pocket and onto the dragon anthro's lap. Looking down, it seems that climbing down Zenth's muscular legs and onto the floor would be easy, and that way you could go explore even more. Or, you could climb up Zenth's shirt and get on top of him.
1312.title: Stay hidden.

13121.content:
You decide to just climb on Zenth. You are extremely bored after all, so why not?

You start to climb on the tightly-woven fabrics that make up his shirt. It takes several minutes to climb up, and his chest moving in and out with his breathing makes it even more difficult. After what seems like forever, you finally manage to climb on Zenth's head. Congratulating yourself on your victory, you don't notice the black scaly claw coming for you. Zenth grips you between his fingers and holds you in front of his face. He gives you a somewhat scolding look and whispers to keep hidden. The bell finally rings, and everyone starts to leave the classroom.

As Zenth walks to wherever he needs to go next, he checks to make sure you haven't fallen out of his pocket. "Please try to be more careful, okay?" You smile and nod your head. You hear what sounds like ducks being strangled, and look to see several little kids running around yelling. "So, why are there random kindergartners running around outside?" you ask. "Well, about everyone from kindergarten to high school goes here. But I swear, if I hear one more voice like that I'll jump out a window. Even if our school only has one floor." You grin to yourself, and hear several anthros talking as you enter the cafeteria.

"I'm going to show you to my friends now, I think that they might be able to help." You are a little nervous, as well as shy, to see Zenth's friends, but Zenth seems pretty nice, so you conclude that his friends must be good too. Zenth picks out his food, and goes to sit at a small round table with a few other anthros sitting around laughing and eating. Zenth sits down, and starts talking with the others. "Hey guys, I have something to show you," he exclaims. "Yea? What is it?" a wolf anthro with light gray fur asks. You are taken out of the pocket, and all eyes turn to look at you. You observe the faces staring at you, and see...
13121.title: The Climb.

131211.content:
Looking around you see that everyone actually looks excited to meet you. You were afraid of their massive size, but notice that they accept you, as a person and not an object. Breathing a mental sigh of relief, you all look at each other in awkward silence. This goes on for about a minute, then everyone breaks out into random laughter. It seems as though you finally found other anthros who might be able to help. It may take a few days, or more, for you to discover a way back to your home. Still, you felt confident, welcomed, and for the second time, a bit hopeful. One of Zenth's friends speaks up, breaking the silence. "So, are you just going to stand there, or come eat? Compared to us, you probably don't need as much, so it's no trouble. Have a seat!" You smile and nod your head, but aren't too sure where to sit. To answer your question, Zenth drops you right on the center of the table.

The next half hour passes, and by then you have learned many of the anthro's names, some of their personalities, and that they want to help you. They also give you some of their food, which fills you up pretty quickly. Eating a burger that was the size of a small house was pretty fun! After casual talk with the anthros you discuss ideas such as where you will stay, and with who. Eventually Zenth decides to have you live with him while you are here. You happily agree, and glance at the gigantic clock. The small hand lay at 12, and the larger one close to the 6, meaning lunch was almost over.
131211.title: Accepted

choices: Multiple voices talking to each other.
1312111.content:
You are surprised to discover that the next class is the last one of the day. It was a pretty short class as well, in under an hour you left the school, perched on Zenth’s shoulder.

"Is it always like this at your school?" you ask Zenth.

"Huh?" he replies, turning his head towards you. "Umm, yeah! The class after lunch is always the last one. Is it different in your world?" You laugh, nodding your head. "Well, we don't have giant bipedal animals walking around in broad daylight. School hours are also much longer." A look of embarrassment appears on the dragon's face. "I meant besides that. You really enjoy messing with my mind, don't you?" Grinning in response, you lay back on the giant's right shoulder, exhausted.

“So where exactly are we going now?”

“Isn’t it obvious?” Zenth replied. “We already decided you would stay with me as long as you were here, and I’m guessing you don’t want to sleep out on the streets. So we’ll stay at my house!” This time you were the one with an embarrassed expression. “R-right, that’s what I would have guessed.”

After laughing at your forgetfulness, the dragon turned right onto a road lined with houses. Putting aside the scale, the houses looked just like the ones you saw every day in your town. It was still hard to believe that everything here could be so similar, yet so different. Zenth broke into a jog, interrupting your thoughts. The sudden movement tripped you up, causing you to fall off his shoulder. Fortunately, you grabbed onto the colossus’s shirt sleeve before you could fall 500 ft. onto the concrete sidewalk. The part of Zenth’s shirt you grabbed wasn’t too far down from where you fell. It only took a matter of seconds to climb up his enormous right bicep. Panting, you pull yourself back up onto Zenth’s shoulder and plop down, so that your back was to his neck. The dragon feels your movement and stops, turning his head to look at you.

“Are you o.k?” You feel his neck muscles tensing against your back; it’s obvious that he’s worried.

“Yeah, I’m fine. Thanks for stopping though.”

The anthro’s huge blue eyes scan over you, checking for injuries. You know it’s a sign of concern, but it still sends chills down your spine. The sight of a humanoid dragon with dark scales, who’s head was bigger than your entire house, staring directly at you with huge pale eyes that almost looked like moons. In fact, his head was so close to yours that it was only possible to see one eye. It reminded you of the giant, fearsome dragons you've seen in storybooks for children. You almost expected him to lunge out at any moment, filling your vision with his pitch-black face.

“Anyway, I’m glad you’re not hurt, I’ll try to walk slower so you don’t fall again. We should be at my house pretty soon.” Zenth continues walking through the neighborhood, though you’ve noticed that he’s slowed down now. After another minute or so, you both come to a fairly large house covered in blue paint. “It looks like we’re here!” Zenth exclaims cheerfully.

From within the house you hear…
1312111.title: End of the Day

13121111.content:
A sigh of relief is heard from both you and Zenth as the house appears to be silent. Turning the doorknob, the dragon poked his head inside and scanned the interior for anyone. Luckily, the house was as empty as it had sounded when you were at the door.

“I guess we’re pretty lucky,” Zenth commented, wiping a drop of sweat off his forehead. “Haha, look, I was so nervous about anybody else seeing you that I actually started sweating!” You smiled, secretly hiding the fact that you were also sweating a little. “Awesome, since nobody’s here yet, I can give you a tour of my house.”

The next few minutes flew by as your friend showed you around his gigantic (to you) living quarters. Finally, after seeing the kitchen, the living room, the bathroom, and everything else, he took you into his room. It looked mostly clean, much better than most teenage boy’s rooms you’ve seen in the past. There were a couple piles of dirty clothes, but that was about all. Zenth plopped down on his bed, gripping you tightly in his hands so he wouldn’t drop you. He then kept you held between his thumb and index finger, above his head so that he was looking directly at you. Gazing downwards at his colossal face, you become light-headed. Zenth released a huge yawn, giving you a full view of his wet throat. You immediately winced; knowing very well what would happen if he let go. Of course he kept his grip on you, making sure you wouldn’t become one of his afternoon snacks. You were still nervous however, even after he closed his mouth.

“Umm.. do you think you could set me down somewhere? I-It’s just that I’m… I’m getting kind of dizzy up here.” You gave your best convincing smile to the giant dragon head below you. “Yeah, sure little guy.” The giant shifted a bit and set you on his left palm.

“Hold on, I just need to take my shirt off really quick. You know, hot day and all,” Zenth said. You gave a small nod and waited as he grabbed the collar with one hand and gave a strong tug, helping the article slide off his body. He then tossed the shirt aside and stretched out on the bed, setting you on his now bare chest.

With the shirt gone, you saw for the first time his tan-colored underbelly, which covered most of his stomach area. You also got to see his wings slide out from under him, which must have been folded up under the t-shirt. They were mostly black (no surprise there) but also had streaks of red down the edges. The tips could have easily touched both walls if Zenth wanted them too, but he kept them only a few feet away from each shoulder. The dragon put his hands behind his head and yawned once more.

“So, what’s the plan?” you asked, a little bored. “Well, until we figure something out, you can eat and sleep here. But I’m not sure if I should show you to my family yet. They may attack, since they’ve never seen a human before.”

“Wait a minute…” you said. “How do you know about humans? I remember you mentioning their name before too.” Zenth’s face contorted, and he responded “Oh yeah, that. Humans are kinda “fictional” in our world. Sort of like how we aren’t real in your world. I mean, you’ve heard of us before, right?”

You laughed. “I guess you’re right, but I never thought anthros would be real, and I never would have known they would be the size of buildings. Zenth smiled and started to respond, but was interrupted by a loud growling noise. You felt a rumble below you, and looked down to see the dragon’s massive hand rubbing his empty stomach. “Hehe, guess I should get some grub in my gut, huh?” He gave a large grin, once again frightening you. Hopefully “grub” meant actual food as supposed to, well, you.

‘Stop thinking like that…’ you scolded yourself. ‘Zenth’s nice; he would never intentionally eat me. Besides, I’m sure he has plenty of other food in his house, so why would he need to use me as a snack?’

“Umm, hello? Are you still here?” the anthro asked, waving his hand in front of you.

‘Oops, I must have spaced out again.’ “Yeah I’m here.” Taking a few seconds to sit up, you get into a more comfortable position while on your friend’s chest.

“Alright, so do you want to go grab something to eat? There should be some chocolate pudding lying around.” “That sounds great, thanks!” You feel really grateful that Zenth found you outside the school, who knows where you might be now without him.

“Cool, let’s go!” The giant lowers his palm for you to step on to, and when you do he gets up and starts walking towards the kitchen.
13121111.title: Private tour.

131211111.content:
The dragon walked into the kitchen and set you on the table. You watch as he goes to the refrigerator and begins rummaging through it. “There should be something in here that you would be able to eat. I doubt anyone will notice food’s missing, since you won’t eat much at your height.” You nod silently, waiting in anticipation for whatever food there was in the refrigerator. After what seemed like minutes, Zenth pulled a small white container out and set it in front of you.

Barely able to control your hunger, you ran over to it and exclaimed, “Alright! Let’s see what we got!” The teenage dragon grinned and untwisted the lid. As soon as it was off a delicious chocolate smell washed over you. Zenth grabbed two bowls and set them on your table, scooping pudding into each. It was pretty obvious which one was for whom, as one bowl had a drop of the dessert while the other looked like a mountain.

“Wait a minute, how are you going to eat that?” your friend realized. “The only way you could get to it is if you were inside the bowl, but then you would just get covered in pudding.” Taking a moment to contemplate this problem, you responded “Well, if there’s no other way, I guess I wouldn’t mind getting a little pudding on me. Do you think you could give me a lift?” The giant grinned, holding out his hand. “Hop on.”

You crawled onto his palm, experiencing that rollercoaster-like sensation as you were lifted into the air. Wind rushed through your hair, leaving a whistling sound in both ears as the world turned to a blur. From Zenth’s perspective, all he was doing was lifting you a few feet into the air. He was even doing it slowly, so as not to let you fall. But it still made you feel light-headed. The massive hand finally stopped against its owner’s chest, making a 90 degree angle. The short ride made you exhausted, so you leaned against the dragon’s bare skin while catching your breath. The warmth emanating from the skin’s surface made you want to sleep. The only thing that kept you awake was the sound of Zenth’s stomach, which you could hear even more clearly now that you were right against his torso. You decided to bring something up so you would forget about the possibility of being eaten.

You opened your mouth to speak. “Ummm.. why did you bring me all the way up here? I only needed to be lifted a few inches so that I could get into my bowl, remember?”
Your friend gave an uncharacteristically somewhat-evil grin, bringing you closer to his face. “Oh, I know. I just thought of something that would be more fun, that’s all.” His words sent a shiver down your spine. Could Zenth have a more mischievous, darker side that you hadn’t seen yet? Or was he just messing with you…

The only way to find out was to ask, so you nervously said “W-What do you mean by that?” The dragon smiled, glad you were playing along. “Well, I was thinking we could…”
131211111.title: Snack Break

1312111111.content:
“...just share a bowl!” Your heart was still pounding with worry of what Zenth might do to you. But after a short moment of terror, his words sunk in. He wasn’t planning to torture you in any way! All he wanted was to use one bowl of chocolate pudding for the both of you!

Zenth must have seen the look on your face, because he broke out into laughter. Your mind snapped back to reality. For the next thirty seconds or so you awkwardly hung in front of the giant’s face, keeping a tight grip on his scaly finger as he continued snickering. A spray of spittle hit your cheek, and you couldn’t even wipe it off. The dragon finally managed to quiet down, or at least enough so that he could talk to you. “Hey, there’s no need to get so mad at me! At least I’m not locking you up in a cage or anything, although you would make a nice pet…”

“Zenth!”

“I was just kidding…” He flipped his hand so that you were sitting safely on his wrist. You immediately took advantage of having a free arm to wipe the dragon saliva off your face. Zenth saw you do this and grinned. “If you can’t even handle one tiny drop of spit, you might not do too well being in my bowl of pudding.” You sighed, saying “I hoped you’d forgotten about that.”

“I’m sure you’re just as hungry as I am, so what do you say we stop beating around the bush and start digging in,” the dragon teen held you several inches above his bowl.

“Wait, are you sure this is safe?” Before your question was answered, Zenth dropped you. You tried screaming, but you were falling so fast that even breathing was impossible. A loud ‘thwok’ sound was heard when you landed. The smell of chocolate surrounded you, and you looked around to find yourself waist-high in pudding. You scooped up a handful of the dessert and stuck it in your mouth. A delicious sensation shot through your body, and you began moving around the bowl while eating more. This was amazing! You hadn’t even realized how hungry you were until now!

As you “swam” through the pudding, a giant metal object struck into it. It then rose up in front of you, carrying a large amount of dessert with it. Looking up, you saw Zenth holding a spoon. “Are you enjoying yourself?” He stuck the spoonful in his mouth, which quickly turned into a small bulge traveling down his neck. You smiled excitedly, replying, “Yeah! But try not to accidentally eat me, okay?”

“Of course not,” the dragon said seriously. The next couple of minutes were filled with chocolate goodness, but you eventually got tired. Your titan sized friend, however, did not. He had to use much less energy than you did, and was still happily eating. That was fine by you, so you collapsed onto the pudding and closed your eyes.

After you rested for a minute, you felt something slide underneath you. Something cold, metallic, and… ‘Oh no,’ you thought. Before you had time to react, you were carried into the air on a giant spoon. You shot a panicked look at Zenth’s face, only to see that his eyes were closed with pleasure. ‘How could this be happening?’ you thought in a state of panic. ‘Maybe he didn’t see me, but if I can get him to hear me…’

The dragon’s maw opened widely, showing off a display of razor-sharp teeth. A blast of warm breath hit you, and his tongue stretched out in anticipation. You knew what would happen if you didn’t get his attention, so you took a deep breath and shouted his name.
1312111111.title: A Dragon's Dessert

13121111112.content:
As you opened your mouth to shout, pudding flooded into it causing you to gag. You tried calling Zenth’s name, but what came out was something like “Znetnghth!!!” The dragon of course didn’t hear this, and you were lifted even closer to his gaping maw. Now you could feel his hot breath wash over your tiny body, and you stared at his giant teeth in a mixture of awe and fear. Each tooth had to be at least as tall as you were! Something that big could crush you without realizing it, which was just about to happen.

The teenager stuck the entire spoonful inside of his mouth, clamping his lips around it. He then pulled the spoon back into the outside world, all of its contents being dropped onto the giant’s tongue. You stood up on the gigantic wet surface and looked for a way to escape. Before you had a chance though, your friend flicked his tongue backwards, launching you towards the back of his throat. You landed in a mixture of pudding and saliva, both soaking into your clothes.

“Zenth!!”

Trying once again to call out, the only response you got was a deep ‘mmmmmmm’ sound. To add even more insult, another helping of pudding was dumped on top of you. Trapped inside the mouth of your anthro friend, covered in his spit, you felt humiliation. Soon, you would be swallowed and dumped into the dragon’s enormous belly, along with his snack. The giant muscle beneath you lifted up and began pushing the food towards its owner’s gullet. More saliva dripped from the palate to help lubricate the already-slick chocolate pudding. A wet gulp was heard as the dragon swallowed loudly. You reached out madly, your hands clawing at the back of the tongue.

Zenth gave a short gag, feeling a tiny object stuck in the back of his throat. For a second he wondered what it could be, but brushed the idea off.

“Must just be some lunch that got stuck in my teeth.” The anthro said dismissively. Zenth then lifted his head up to help the meal slide down his throat. You tightened your grip on the giant’s tongue, screaming and pleading. Your words fell on deaf ears though, and gravity won out causing you to let go. The dragon gave one last swallow and felt his snack begin to move down his neck.

Tight throat muscles squeezed all around you and pushed you into Zenth’s belly. After falling through the muscular opening, you landed in a pool of thick stomach fluids. A large belch was heard, rumbling your surroundings. The colossal teen sighed and rubbed his gut happily. You could see the silhouette of his hand moving through the faint light of the stomach wall, until it pulled away. The light that came through the dragon’s skin allowed you to see everything he had eaten. You didn’t exactly want to see the contents of your friends stomach, most of the stuff you could see was just pudding and saliva. Lots and lots of saliva. The shirt you had on was dripping with the liquid, making it extremely heavy.

Standing up, Zenth let out another belch. He then remembered you.

“Hey little human! Where are you right now?!” The anthro poked around in what was left of the bowl of pudding, not knowing that you were inside his own, personal, “bowl”. After several seconds, he gave up. “Alright, I know that you’re in there somewhere. I’ll come get you later.”

Zenth then started walking to his room, the sudden movement knocking you over into a pile of digested food. It smelled like pizza, but given how it looked now it could have been anything. You just hoped that the same thing wouldn’t happen to you. You felt the boy sit down on his bed, still unaware of the extra bit of meat he ate.

He shivered; it was a lot colder in here than it was earlier. Picking up his shirt, Zenth began putting it back on. As the fabric slipped over his chest and covered his once bare stomach, the light that previously shone through his stomach wall disappeared. Now that he was warmer, Zenth started to wonder where you were.
13121111112.title: Swallowed Alive

The sun was shining, the clouds seemed graceful, the wind was blowing peacefully, the rolling waves seemed oddly large, and you were sitting in the middle of sand with giant rocks sitting right behind you while sand was being crammed into your clothing. In the distance you saw figures splashing around in the water and other figures on the beachside doing whatever people usually did, although something didn't seem right about the people. Their skin seemed off of tone, some of them seemed much more hairer than most people you've seen at beaches, and proportionally their bodies didn't seem human, it looked...animalistic.

Other options remain is just explore the area to find something interesting or just swim in the ocean just because it is a sunny and hot day and you really wanted to get out of your clothes, which the rocks were convenient. After some contimplating on your actions, you decided to...

141.content:
Deciding that getting help would be the smartest choice, you begin to walk towards the area filled with "people", most of whom are lying on their beach towels, probably trying to soak up some sunlight.

At your normal size, walking past a few beach-goers would have been no problem. Unfortunately, you were anything but your "normal size." You constantly found yourself sinking waist deep into the sand, and had to empty your shoes on multiple occasions. At the same time you shielded your eyes from bits of sand that the wind blew into your face. After a couple minutes, you reached the public area and took cover behind a pile of sand.

Now that you were closer, it was easier to watch the strange giant figures. They were mostly animal, as you thought, but the weird thing was that most of them wore bathing suits. Actually, they ALL wore a swimsuit of some kind, whether it be black or pink or skimpy or modest. Because of their swimsuits it was easy to... how should I put this... recognize their genders. Thankfully all inappropriate parts were covered up.

Sighing absentmindedly, you trace your finger across the miniature (to the anthros) pile of sand. Suddenly a giant paw slams down in front of you, crushing your hiding place.

"Betcha' can't catch me Emma!" You look up in terror to see a short weasel boy, probably no older than 9, running past you.

"No fair! You're faster than me!" An even shorter female weasel tries her best to keep up with him. You take a wild guess that they're siblings.

Without your sand pile you are completely visible, and in your mind exposed to whoever these giant animal people are. As your heart rate slowly lowers, you realize that you need to think of something that will keep you from getting stomped on, and that you need to think fast! Around you are several anthros partaking in various activities. If you can get their attention without ending up on the bottom of their feet, they might be able to help you.

You quickly scan the area, and spot someone who could help your predicament.
141.title: Ah, the Beach

You see a large figure, female given her body shape, laying down on the beach. She was far away so you couldn't completely see what kind of anthro she was, but she strangely appeared white with purple highlights. "What kind of critter is that?" you ask yourself. You could hear the anthro chick snoring and figure she might be able to help.

You run across the sand, narrowing avoiding getting stomped by a wild boar woman walking by and you have to zigzag as a giant lion walks from the side. Thankfully these anthros hadn't seen you yet because you have no idea what they'd think of a tiny human. Did humans even exist in their world.

As you're about to reach the strange white and purple anthro, you look up and see a strange sign. There are bright yellow letters, but you can't make out what's written on the sign. As you approach the purple and white anthro, you look in surprise because you think you've come across a big purple tail.

You hear stomping and then look up and you can't believe it, you see a hippopotamus woman with pitch black skin applying sun tan lotion, only this hippo woman had holes in her back that were leaking out sand. That woman wasn't a hippo, she was a Hippowdon, a Pokemon. Pokemon anthros? How was this possible. Then you walk towards the purple and white anthro woman sleeping and learn she is in fact a Mewtwo.

But she's no ordinary Mewtwo, she apparently underwent Mega Evolution into...

You're hesitant to walk forward as you advance towards the back of this giantess, but then you remember that parasaurolophus dinosaurs were herbivores, what were you worried about? You immediately run to the dino woman's back and start to rub it as she continues snoring and sunbathing. You even pull on her bikini top and snap it before you go back to massaging her back.

Hopefully she'll feel you and maybe she could help you out.

14123211211.content:
"Well, hey there little guy," she says in a booming, but rather pleasant voice. "What brings a cute little thing like you out here to the beach? I'm kinda surprised a seagull hasn't snatched you up by now."

You're too petrified to speak or move, only nodding your head up and down at her words. Her muzzle gains a knowing smirk, amused with your behavior.

"Relax, little man. I'm not gonna hurt ya." She chuckles, and lays down in the sand in front of you, arms folded under her impressive rack. From your position you can stare right down into her cleavage. "Despite what you might think, I don't eat things that can hold a conversation with me. I like to think I have more morals than that."

You breathe a sigh of relief. "Thank goodness for that." After you calm down, you explain to her your situation, how you wound up in this new world, shrunk on a beach with giant anthros and trying desperately to find help and avoid getting eaten or stepped on.

She tilts her head a bit and smirks. "So, you're basically an alien from another world, and have no idea how you got to be this size? Sounds trippy."

"Pretty much, yeah."

"Bet you weren't expecting to see someone like me, huh? Like what you see?", she grins and bounces her chest a bit, clearly enjoying your flustered reaction.

You blush furiously and nod. "Y-yes, I'll admit you're very attractive, ma'am. I was just a little more concerned with your intentions with me, considering...um...well.." You try to find the right words, but she interrupts you

"Don't worry about it, you're not the only one who's ever looked at me that way. It's a vicious stereotype; I can't help it if I look like I might rip someone's throat out with my teeth at a moment's notice, even when I'm trying to be nice." She stops and shakes her head. "I have no intention of eating you, if you're still worried about that. I'd actually like to help you out, if you'll let me."

She smiles and lays her hand out in front of you. After a moments hesitation, you climb into her palm, and she brings you up to her face, standing up in the process.

"My name's Sierra, by the way," she says.

The giant that approaches you brings her enormous hoof down in front of you, creating a sandstorm that knocks you on your feet. The okapi woman then gives a smile but from your vantage point, you don't know if the smile is friendly or malicious. For all you knew, the okapi woman was planning to eat you.

Of course, if she was, she wasn't doing it just now because she takes you down in front of her rather large rear and unzips the left compartment of her fanny pack. She tosses you inside and you land with a grunt next to her wallet and her car keys. You rub your head and groan before the okapi woman zips you in and hums to herself as she walks away. She walks up to a pink convertible, unlocks the door and steps inside, sitting on top of her fanny pack and consequently you in the process as you give a grunt. You're not going to believe this but I found a human at the beach today. No, I am not drunk! I'm as surprised as you are that humans are actually real. Listen. I'm on my way home right now. You struggle for 10 minutes but the giant okapi woman that captured and now sat on you doesn't even feel you. Now that you think about it, a snack sounds nice--you felt really hungry after your whole ordeal so far. Who knew near-death experiences could stir your appetite? Aloud: "Sure, Lisa; sounds great." Lisa giggles at you answer as she stands up...then puts you between her ample breasts as she fishes around in a cooler for her wallet. Lisa smirks and points between her breasts. "Well, ask my human friend here!" The gator-guy squints--looking a bit embarrassed to be oggling a customer--before he spots you, eyes going wide. Never heard of any anthro--'cept a few sickos--keepin humans in cages against their will, and what we normally do is more like...roommates. Humans and anthros living together--but the human has a little house of their own inside the anthro's house. Mutual respect and whatnot. We just say 'pets' 'cause it's the anthro who let the human in as a guest. But nobody'd claim to straight-up own you, little guy."

You blink, nodding. That was better than you expected. "Do humans always live with anthros like that?"

"Nah, there's plenty of human-only towns and cities...they're just off-limits to us anthros most of the time. There's plenty of little meet-up spots where we can mingle, though."

You're about to ask another question when the sound of thudding footsteps reaches your ears. Most anthros had them from your perspective, but these were different: they sounded like whoever was making them was big even by anthro standards...and walking right toward you and Lisa. The cow-titaness cranes her head around, also picking up the sound, and looks at you with a grin. "Don't worry, just one of my girlfriends," she assures you. "I think she'll like meeting you, even. Get ready to meet..."

The mastodon girl scratches her back and moves side to side as you hang on in her hair and yell. The big woman snorts and gives a look of annoyance. "If that's some tick trying to crawl on me." The mastodon puts her hands through her hair and you jump from side to side trying to avoid her and slide down to one of her ears before you grab the ledge. Your hands slip due to the earwax and you're about to fall to her shoulder, but then you turn and see something.

The mastodon woman is sniffing her own ear with her massive trunk and you turn and gasp before the trunk picks up your scent and the mastodon girl inhales you. You yell as you're sucked in and you try to stand up, but you're stuck in place my mastodon mucus. You put your hands together and hope that you're not dealing with a hostile animal.

The mastodon lifts her trunk and then puts it to her eye before she snorts you out. You shake off her nose slime and then she finally notices you and her eye pops. "Oh," she says. "It was a human." Wait, she knew what you were. She didn't seem to be hostile, but just then you feel one of her nostrils constrict on your leg as she holds you upside-down.

You struggle in the mastodon's grip before the big prehistoric elephant giantess drops you...
153311.title: Climbing the Colossus

choices: Demand to know where she's going, right now!
Screw it. Just relax for now...
1533111.content:
"Well, if you wanted my attention, little guy, you certainly got it," your giant captress comments with a smirk. "Climbing me is one thing, but tapping my butt? That takes guts! Heck, it's so brave I'm not even mad!"

Between flailing around you gasp out, "I...didn't mean...to...touch your butt! Honest! Oh, Christ please don't eat me--!"

The mastodon-girl laughs at your frantic plea, her breath coming out as gusts of wind that make you whip around like a flag. "Oh, calm down. I'm not gonna eat you, squirt--I'm not some evil bitch to you little guys, and besides that, you're so small it'd be like I never ate anything. You'd barely be a snack!"

You're not sure if that's reassuring or insulting. "Um, thanks?"

"No problem. Now, so you won't get a head-rush from hanging upside down like that...say 'Geronimo!'"
And with that, she drops you.

And you don't say "Geronimo", or anything coherent. You just scream all the way down, tumbling through the air as gravity takes hold...until you land with a distinct *BOING!* on one of her ample breasts, face-first. You bounce into the air, land on your back on her other breast, and slide down between them before finally coming to a stop.

The whole affair leaves you dizzy, dazed, and damn drained. You groggily look up from between the two furry hills pinning you from the sides, and find the mastodon girl looking down at you and winking.

"Comfy down there, little guy?"
1533111.title: Between Two "Mountains"

153312.content:
As you climb all the way up to the mastodon's tail and place your feet at the side of her underwear, you feel tremors and hear a creaking noise as the bench comes back into place. You hold on tight to her tail and scream because the mastodon girl is getting up and walking away as she puts her cellphone away. The mastodon girl shakes her head and trumpets as she starts to walk away from the park. "She just never listens to me. I don't know why I waste my breath."

The mastodon girl's footsteps cause tremors as you struggle to hold on to her tail. As you're shaking, you look down and see that you must be 500 ft in the air. That meant that the mastodon girl was way bigger than that since you were only up to her butt. It doesn't help that she keeps wagging her tail. Your hands were slipping and it looked like you would fall.

But then you look down and see that the mastodon woman had a back pocket in her jeans. As the tail wags, you take a leap and land right in the pocket. You peak your head out and see that the mastodon still doesn't know you're there. You breath a sigh of relief. Who knows how an enormous pachyderm would do if she saw a tiny man touching her butt.

But as you look out, you see that this entire city was anything but normal. There were giant anthros everywhere, but unlike the mastodon girl, they were dinosaurs and similar creatures. There was a sarcosuchus girl getting her hair done by a tyrannosaurus girl and an allosaurus girl delivering a pizza. You're guessing the mastodon isn't originally from this city. The question is, where is the elephantine titaness heading?
153312.title: Getting Up

153331.content:
You see that the giant anthro speaking on the phone was an equine of some kind, that is to say, a horse and from the sound of it, they were just hanging up. You walk closer and you see that the horse is a mare with dark pewter hooves based on your spot on the ground. She also had pale pink fur and long teal hair that was worn in a combination of a ponytail and a beehive and reached down to the ground past even her own tail.

You step back and see that the mare was somewhat fat with wide hips and a large belly that touched her knees. She appeared to be wearing a blue and white striped shirt and a pair of skin-tight jeans as well as a pair of gold earrings. The mare was also reading a book of some sort but it was too high up for you to read it. It was obviously hardcover and was a large novel. You step back and then you see that you appear to be in a park of some kind. There were giant anthros everywhere that ranged from 500ft to even past the 1000ft mark.

You rub your eyes and see a shadow over you and then look into the sky to see a female anthropomorphic crane with an amazing hourglass figure who was flying overhead. Then you step back as you watch a giant purple and white cobra anthro slither by. You couldn’t tell the gender of the snake because you were too scared of a giant carnivorous reptile following after you to get a good look of the snake or let the snake see you.

You look out and see that there are even more anthros going around the park, at least twenty of them and they all came in various species. They were different canines, felines, equines, bovids, birds, reptiles, amphibians and even some anthros of a phoenix and a dragon. You were boggled. This was a brand new world dominated by anthropomorphic animals the size of skyscrapers. You were now afraid. After all, what would they think about seeing a tiny human?

Before you could think anymore in the matter there is a gust of wind and the ginormous mare on the enormous bench behind you grunts and accidentally drops her book. The large book lands at your side and you scream as you’re nearly flattened. The giant horse girl bends over, lifting her humongous rear into the air as she picks up her book. But then she spots you and looks in surprise.

You try to run but the enormous mare lifts you up by the shirt and you grunt as she lifts you into the air and sits back up. “A human?” she asks.

You’re now very afraid. Exactly what does this giant mare think of humans?
153331.title: Big As A Horse

choices: Put Up a Fight in Her Stomach to Make Her Sick
1533312.content:
You hope and pray that this fat horse giantess does not mean you any ill will but then the horse giantess smiles at you. “Oh,” she says. “A human. It’s been a long time since I’ve seen one. You don’t see two many of them in this area. Aren’t you the cutest thing.” You then blink. She didn’t appear to be hostile and was even grinning at you. “You’ve heard of humans?” you ask. “There are humans in this world.” The horse giantess then smiles and nods her head. “That’s right. And I just love humans.

You let out a sigh of relief. You guess that the anthros in this dimension weren’t as hostile or destructive as you thought. This giant, fat, pink, mare, in fact, seemed very inviting. However, that’s when you see her staring down at you and hear her giggling. You’re at first confused but then you decide that it’s probably nothing more than harmless schoolgirl-style laughter and that the horse giantess was only giddy that she found a cute little human.

But then your eyes pop because the horse giantess giggles again and then licks her lips. “Oh,” she says. “I do love humans. Where I come from, you’re quite the delicacy.” You’re now very afraid and the horse girl stares at you hungrily as her tongue moves around. “And you appeared at the exact right time,” says the giantess horse. “I’m absolutely starving. I’m so hungry, I can’t control myself.” Then the mare pokes you with one of her fingernails and makes you scream aloud.


Then the mare licks you slightly and makes you shiver as she coats her in your drool and then lifts you higher in the air. “And you,” she says. “My little human. You are so tiny, so adorable and so scrumptious looking… YOU COULD BE EATEN BY A HORSE!” The horse giantess laughs at her own joke and slaps her obese stomach before lifting you higher and higher up as you scream. You try slipping out of her shirt to escape but she reflexively grabs you by the leg. You look down in pure horror to see the enormous mare’s mouth wide open with her large hill sized teeth and her large serpent-like red tongue moving about. Behind it was the big black hole that lead to her throat and stomach.

“Bottoms up, little human.” Says the mare. You let out a scream as the mare drops you and you land in her mouth just as it snaps shut. You try climbing up her tongue but she shakes it around moaning in joy as she enjoys your flavor and listens to you scream as you’re knocked around. You try to maintain your grip on the tip of the horse woman’s tongue but you slip and slide towards her throat. “No! No! No! Oh no! Oh no!” you yell as you fall into the black hole.

Outside the pink horse gulps loudly and from the outside you’re nothing more than a tiny bulge moving down her throat and screaming a muffled scream until you land with a big splash in her stomach juices and are submerged. You cringe and wait to be dissolved but for some reason the acids have no effect on you and you swim up to take a deep breathe. Suddenly the entire stomach is rocked about by a loud belch and you’re bludgeoned by waves of slime as you’re forced to plug your ears.

Outside the horse smiles to herself and taps her bloated tummy, further threatening to damage your hearing. “You were a delicious little snack,” says the horse as she picks up her book. “Now, I’m going to finish reading my novel, so you be a good little human and melt down to make my waistline bigger.”

Obviously the mare doesn’t realize her acids somehow have no effect on you. You have to get out of this horse belly somehow, but what are you going to do?
1533312.title: Eat Like a Horse

154.content: Possibly you like visit a giant palace.
154.title: More Place Options.

choices: Go to the King and Queen.
Try to talk to a Guest.
Try to get down from the table.
1541.content:
You woke on a large feasting table.
Everything around you were giant!
You must've been in some kind of Giant's home!

You could see the rest of the room was covered in artwork and other elegant objects.

Your entire body shook as you heard large loud step coming into the room.

You looked and saw several Anthros coming in.
The two most elegant Anthros must have been the owners of the palace.
The two Anthros were Lions. The male lion had sandy colored fur and had a brown mane. The lioness had darker fur but of course had no mane.

All of the Anthros were dressed in the expensive clothing worn in the Middle Ages.
They were all dressed in party gowns and masks.

They all laughed and talked to each other.

The servants came and sat the large Anthros at the table and poured them wine.

You tried to yell but no one noticed.

What would you do next?
1541.title: That would be  awesome.

15411.content:
The King and Queen sat on the opposite end of the table and you were in the middle of the table. Could you make it?

You got up and started to make your way to the end of the table.

On your way you had to jump from plate to plate as the servants were putting dishes on the table.
You jumped on a servant who was walking over to the king and Queen. Or so you thought.
The servant walked into the kitchen and you decided to jump on the plate. If you couldn't get the attention of the King and Queen you would to get the attention of the server.
The server didn't notice you and put the metal cover over the plate and carried you over to the table.
You were on a tray of rolls and you were laying on one.

The plates were uncovered and people started to dig in.

The Queen's hang hung over the roll you were on and grabbed you.
The furry palm covered your crys for help as she carried the roll to her large maw.
Her stained teeth and drooling mouth was the only thing you saw before you were shoved into her moist and hot maw.
The Queen's tounge rubbed all over you and you were covered with saliva.
You tried to knock on her teeth to get her attention.
The Queen noticed and spat you out on a napkin.
The Queen cleaned you off and looked at you curiously. "Why has a tiny traveler been found on my food?" She asked you.

"I-I don't know, Ma'am" you told her.

"Don't be scared, dear one. My name is Anastasia." She told you.

The lioness looked at you smiled.
"I'll put you in my pocket and hand you food." She told you.
You nodded as she put you in her pocket.

During dinner she did what she said and handed you bits of food to eat. The food was elegant. You could get used to this.

After Dinner the Lioness excused herself and went to her bathing quarters.

She took you out of her pocket.

"I promise you'll be taken care of if you promise to be my...
15411.title: Go to the King and Queen.

choices: you wanted to introduce yourself to the drunk guests.
you wanted to wait and meet the lion who would now be your father.
154111.content:
The gentle giantess looked at your tiny form and smiled softly. "I promise that if you agree to be my cub, I'll make sure that you are cared for,'' she had finally explained. you were shocked. you could not say anything, you tried to speak but nothing came out. The lioness looked at you with an almost heartbroken look. she gave you a begging look that tore at your heart. The lioness looked away trying not to cry, "I am not able to have a cub that is of my own blood, my heart burns for something to take care of. please. if you agree to be my tiny cub I"ll make sure you are pampered beyond reason. I promise you endless love and even the promise of being king.'' she begged.

you listened to this and felt your heart melt. you were always a big softie.... well a ''little'' softie, now.
you just had to help this lioness. you could tell that she was telling the truth.

''I will be your cub, Anastatia. I, myself have never had a mother.'' you told her.

The giant lioness looked at you and smiled from ear to hear. her sadness had now melted away along with her heart. the lioness quicky grabbed you and coddled you like a newborn cub. she kisses you several times and just sat there cuddling and coddling you. she felt like she could do this forever.
''Oh, my dear cub! I am so happy to hear this from you, I promise that I will love you forever. I will always take care of you,'' She told you.

you smiled as the lioness cuddled you. she was warm and gentle. you could tell she was going to try to spoil you. mostly with cuddles.
the lioness continued to snuggle you as she thought of what to do next. she could show you to all the guests at the party at once, though this may not be very smart as most of the guests are most likely drunker than drunk. Or, tonight she could show her little darling to his father and plan a "Birthday Ball''.
she smiled and looked at you with her large gentle violet eyes. She kissed you, not noticing her wine red lipstick had rubbed off on you and gently smiled and questioned you. ''My dear cub, would you like to introduce yourself to all those guests tonight, or would you like to wait and meet your father, first? oh, I know he will just adore you."

you thought about what she had said and told her that...

info.brief_description: You stumble upon a world of gigantic anthropomorphic creatures! GP's for good adds!
info.description:
You had a pretty normal life, until you found that rock that is. Touching that rock sent you into a strange world filled with giant half-animal half-human creatures that called themselves anthros. Their lifestyle was pretty similar to yours, except that everything was about 100x bigger. Now you just have to decide, what will you do next?

Rules:

-Keep the story in 2nd person (you)

-No sexual content, this is a 13+ story. That includes things like nudity, anal vore, and anthros stuffing you down their underwear.

-No deaths: Sorry, but I find the death scenes really disturbing, no offense to anyone who likes them though.

-In general, please keep things pg-13 and under.

-Have fun!! Other than that, do whatever you want! Will you stay in one of the anthro's houses, attend an anthro school, or come across less-than-friendly anthros. Just be creative and write some chapters! I can't wait to see all of the crazy things you people will write! ;) Feel free to contact my on-site email or leave me a message if you have any questions.

Enjoy!!! :D

As of today (3-24-13), gift points are back! I haven't decided on a set amount to reward, so the number of gift points you earn will depend on the quality of the chapter.

I'd like to give a huge thanks to everyone who's added so far (2 Winged Dragon, ????, Runic, wolffury, redhurricane...) and to all of you for reading! Let's help it grow even more! The kitty wants you to...
